name: Ragatour
0:
”Alexa open raga tour”
”Alexa start raga tour”
”Alexa launch raga tour”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: raga tour
des:
Ragatour is a Carnatic raga recognition challenge that tests your skills in detecting primordial sound (nāda), tonal system (Swara), pitch (śruti), scale, ornaments (gamaka) and important tones. etc. 

There are three modes in the game: easy, medium, and hard with increasing levels of difficulty. Scores are calculated for each difficulty level separately. Check back regularly to maintain your lead in the game. 

Here are the things you can say, once you invoke the audio skill.

→ Alexa change difficulty level to Easy/Medium/Hard - To change difficulty level
→ Alexa what’s my score - To get your current score
→ Alexa tell me about shankarabharanam - To know about a particular raga
→ Alexa restart the game - To start a game as a new user
→ Alexa help - To get detailed instructions

Good Luck!
